text: @StephenAtHome @DrLaPook I wish you would stop lying. WHO gave out false information about the virus & as a result cost many lives. Fauci in February was still saying no change to regular activities was necessary. Where is his accountability. I'm sick of you criticizing POTUS. STOP LYING!
